title: Case Study 1
heading: GTM Strategy for a US based Enterprise Solutions Company
description: A successful GTM strategy for a US-based enterprise solutions company required strong market positioning targeting mid-to-large enterprises in finance, healthcare, and technology sectors. We implemented an account-based marketing approach combined with strategic partnerships, resulting in a 47% increase in qualified leads within 6 months. The tailored SaaS pricing model with enterprise licensing options drove $2.3M in new ARR while maintaining 92% customer retention.

title: Case Study 2
heading: Communication Strategy and Design Development for a Niche Technology Player
description: For a specialized AI-powered logistics platform, we developed a comprehensive communication framework that clarified their complex value proposition. Our rebranding included a new visual identity system and messaging architecture that increased website conversion by 35%. The integrated campaign across digital, events, and analyst relations positioned them as thought leaders, contributing to a successful Series B funding round of $28M.

title: Case Study 3
heading: Fraction CMO service for an Industry specific ERP company
description: As fractional CMO for a manufacturing ERP provider, we overhauled their go-to-market strategy to focus on vertical-specific solutions. By implementing targeted account-based campaigns and developing case studies showcasing ROI metrics, we helped increase average deal size by 62%. The restructured sales enablement materials and competitive battlecards reduced sales cycles from 9 to 5 months while improving win rates against key competitors.
